casebody.data:
Corey Scott HART
v.
James Patrick BRIENZA and Gaston County No. 184P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016. Martha Raymond Thompson, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, Ryan L. Bostic, Attorney at Law, for Brienza, James Patrick. Jason E. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Hickory, Lawrence Brian Serbin, Attorney at Law, for Hart, Corey Scott.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of May 2016 by Defendant (James Patrick Brienza) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
